Class InventorySystem

java.lang.Object
inventory.InventorySystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAddStock, IDispense, IInventory, IRemoveStock, IUpdateAlert
public class InventorySystem extends Object implements IAddStock, IRemoveStock, IUpdateAlert, IDispense
class for managing the medicine inventory
